homeBgDataList.bgDes: Situated on the top deck of Rhodes Island, a familiar view that greets you every morning on your way to work.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: You stroll around the top deck, the twin moons high in the sky. And so ends another normal day on Terra.
homeBgDataList.bgUsage: A photo, a memory, a moment in time that encapsulates the entirety of Terra.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Lurking evil and tidings unseen. Stories under cloudy skies rarely have good endings.

homeBgDataList.bgDes: Set aside all worries and enjoy a brief respite. To many, this is an extravagant dream.

Clear Lone Trail CW-10 with a 3-star rating

mail_500w_closure_1.title: Greetings from Closure
mail_500w_closure_1.content:
Doctor,
Thanks for working so hard these days. Rhodes Island wouldn't have made it this far without your efforts.
Hope this salted egg yolk flavor chocolate, or I should say the calories it has, can help relieve your pressure at work.

Closure

mail_500w_closure_2.title: Greetings from Closure
mail_500w_closure_2.content:
Doctor,
Operators of the Medical Department keep reminding me high-calorie and high-fat food is extremely bad for our health and body figure...
But it tastes just GOOD!
Here's the same chocolate I gave you yesterday. Enjoy another bite.

Closure

mail_500w_closure_3.title: Greetings from Closure
mail_500w_closure_3.content:
Doctor,
I like having snacks during overtime to focus, just like you do. I guess that's what all modern workers have in common.
But it seems useless to distracted Operators.
Here's the chocolate for today.

Closure

mail_500w_closure_4.title: Greetings from Closure
mail_500w_closure_4.content:
Doctor,
You know what, actually most snacks from the Purchase Department were developed by accident during our drug researches. Incredible food that was developed unintentionally, sounds romantic, right?
Well, but we didn't develop this chocolate. It's from a friend of mine.

Closure

mail_500w_closure_5.title: Greetings from Closure
mail_500w_closure_5.content:
Doctor,
Good morning! I got good news today. Many Operators love the chocolate! Looks like it will become the bestselling snack soon!
Here's another one for you! But you gotta pay LMD for it next time!

Closure

mail_500w_closure_6.title: Greetings from Closure
mail_500w_closure_6.content:
Doctor,
... The formal sale of the chocolate has been rejected.
The reason seems to be the strong objection of Miss Dobermann, Cardigan and other Operators. I don't know why but they just oppose the spread of this snack.
So I guess I can only give them to you.

Closure

mail_500w_closure_7.title: Greetings from Closure
mail_500w_closure_7.content:
Doctor,
The chocolate plan did fail, but that's not even a setback for a researcher!
The development of new sanity food is ongoing! Please stay tuned!
Here's the last chocolate. Please take them out for me.

Closure

mail_5002_amiya_1.title: Letter from Amiya
mail_5002_amiya_1.content:
Dear Doctor,
Last time when we talked about Kazimierz, Dr. Kal'tsit sent me away.
I heard it's a country full of mountains and forests, and it has many legends and relics. I really feel like travelling there with you.
Here's the lunch for today. It's fine to have fast food sometimes. I love its drink!

Amiya

mail_500w_kazimierz_1.title: Contact from Kazimierz①
mail_500w_kazimierz_1.content:
Doctor,
Here's the news from the outskirts of Kazimierz. Operator Grani has arrived in Dewville safely, but our communicate has become slow and irregular. It's strange because that village is remote though, it is supposed to have functional communication equipment.
Hope everything is fine.

Liaison of Rhodes Island

mail_5002_amiya_2.title: Letter from Amiya
mail_5002_amiya_2.content:
Dear Doctor,
So you are also interested in Kazimierz? Great! I love the stories Miss Meteor and Miss Meteorite told me! By the way, although Miss Nearl is also from Kazimierz, she said the Kazimierz she knows may be different from the one in Miss Meteor's mind. I wonder why...

Amiya

mail_500w_kazimierz_2.title: Contact from Kazimierz②
mail_500w_kazimierz_2.content:
Doctor,
Operator Grani has managed to enter the village and meet the client.
The village has been damaged to some extent, but the government of Kazimierz didn't send any help to it.
I feel anxious about the villagers there.

Liaison of Rhodes Island

mail_500w_meteo_1.title: Greetings from Meteorite
mail_500w_meteo_1.content:
Honorable Doctor,
Would you like to know something about Kazimierz? The Kazimierz Knight Tournament has attracted so many travelers these years, and the knights from the ancient times have become part of the game and the symbol of the country. I love the tournament, too! I've collected a lot of knight posters, including Miss Nearl's! But please keep it a secret from Miss Nearl. Thank you.

Meteorite

mail_500w_kazimierz_3.title: Contact from Kazimierz③
mail_500w_kazimierz_3.content:
Doctor,
Grani Operator has confirmed the content of the mission. She is entering the undeveloped forests of Kazimierz.
I've received report that massive unknown forces have set an ambush there.
But they seem to be prepared, so we can look forward to their next message.

Liaison of Rhodes Island

mail_500w_shotst_1.title: Greetings from Meteor
mail_500w_shotst_1.content:
Dear Doctor,
Amiya told me you are also interested in Kazimierz, right? I have lived in the forest of Kazimierz in most of my time.
Those are vast forests with precious woods and animals, so there are also quite some poachers. We love the forests, so we take responsibility for guarding them.
Go visit there if you have the chance. I'm sure the forest of Kazimierz will give you a warm welcome.

Meteor

mail_500w_kazimierz_4.title: Contact from Kazimierz④
mail_500w_kazimierz_4.content:
Doctor,
Dewville is not a rare example. The whole outskirts of Kazimierz is basically self-governing.
Due to their locations, all the villages in the region often get harassed by the thugs that pass by.
It looks like the government of Kazimierz abandoned them long ago.

Liaison of Rhodes Island

mail_500w_meteo_2.title: Greetings from Meteorite
mail_500w_meteo_2.content:
Honorable Doctor,
Well, please don't ask Firewatch anything about Kazimierz. She has a complicated feeling about this country.
Different from the powerful cities it has, the villages there are mostly remote and poor, and Firewatch's village is one of them. Apparently she loves her hometown, but it's also true that she hates the Kazimierz government, as they never sent any help.

Meteorite

mail_500w_kazimierz_5.title: Contact from Kazimierz⑤
mail_500w_kazimierz_5.content:
Doctor,
After the investigation, we have confirmed that Kazimierz knights did have a special custom—leaving legacies to the people—as they hoped to give something to the descendants even after they died, and they often set some tests in the way. But the tests are too difficult for most people so they gave up the search long ago.

Liaison of Rhodes Island

mail_500w_nearl_1.title: Greetings from Nearl
mail_500w_nearl_1.content:
Distinguished Doctor,
It seems that many Operators have told you about the situation of Kazimierz. I am not writing to blame or cover anything. As my homeland, Kazimierz has its own beauty and greatness, but corruptions also exist. I am not an objector of the Knight Tournament, but the gray powers and trades behind it have destroyed the rebirth of the creed of the ancient knights, and even turned it into a promotion tool and the cover of the fake peace.

Nearl

mail_500w_kazimierz_6.title: Contact from Kazimierz⑥
mail_500w_kazimierz_6.content:
Doctor,
We have received Operator Grani's response and it looks like the mission in Dewville is almost done.
They have managed to find the treasure, fix the village, defeat the bounty hunters and even save the enemies that needed help.
The mounted police of Rhodes Island deserves her reputation.

Liaison of Rhodes Island

mail_500w_nearl_2.title: Contact from Nearl
mail_500w_nearl_2.content:
Dear Doctor,
Did you know that an operator has been carrying out a mission in Kazimierz lately? Her father was one of the migrants who traveled to Victoria from Kazimierz. Although Kazimierz has pushed back Ursus every time it has tried to invade their border, many civilians there were tired of the warring and could no longer stand the pride and arrogance of the knights. That's why they moved to Victoria to start a new life. Kazimierz's great power is also not without a great weakness.

Nearl

mail_500w_kazimierz_7.title: Contact from Kazimierz⑦
mail_500w_kazimierz_7.content:
Doctor:
According to Grani's report, one of Reunion's soldiers also participated in this operation. He acted independently from the rest of Reunion's power structure, and never received any orders or instructions from their leadership. While this person did not threaten our interests, one must wonder... How far has the influence of Reunion spread?

Liaison of Rhodes Island

mail_newyear_2021_1.title: Blessings from Lava
mail_newyear_2021_1.content:
Happy 1.5 Anniversary, Doctor! Nian just asked me to bring you some presents.
I happened to pass by and thought I could be of help.
Get ready for the celebration, Doctor! Why are you still working?
Anyways, just have fun and stay away from Hibiscus's Healthy Meal.

mail_newyear_2021_2.title: Blessings from Dobermann
mail_newyear_2021_2.content:
Here are some presents from the instructors. Happy 1.5 Anniversary, Doctor.
There is no training session today so I can finally take a break as well.
Just wanna say thank you for always being so supportive.
And I hope next anniversary we can get together and celebrate again.

mail_newyear_2021_3.title: Blessings from Bison
mail_newyear_2021_3.content:
Hello Doctor, I have a delivery for you, please sign here.
And here's another delivery from myself, hope you'll like it!
Ahaha, I've so grown used to the busy schedule and can't let myself rest even during celebrations.
Don't be like me. Rest when you can, Doctor!

mail_newyear_2021_4.title: Blessings from Nian
mail_newyear_2021_4.content:
Hey, it's the 1.5 Anniversary, I've got you a little something.
Of course I know it's not time yet. A little bit early won't make a difference, just take it.
Unlike Lava, I don't give out presents pretending it's from someone else~
See ya!

mail_newyear_2021_5.title: Blessings from Amiya
mail_newyear_2021_5.content:
Doctor, Happy 1.5 Anniversary! Everything's going alright?
I have asked Bison to deliver my presents to you, but operators from Yen told me it's only presents handed in person that matter.
So, I... I have picked these for you. I hope you like it...
I'm... I'm feeling your delight! I'm glad you like my presents, Doctor!

mail_newyear_2022_1.title: Blessings from Kroos
mail_newyear_2022_1.content:
Doctor~
I've been looking everywhere for you! I just went and put your gifts in your office. I went to a lot of trouble to get you these~
I even put in a can of my absolute favorite food. I do hope you'll like it.
Now if you accept my gift, you can't call me lazy ever again~
Ha~ppy~ Anni~versary~

mail_newyear_2022_2.title: Blessings from Waai Fu
mail_newyear_2022_2.content:
Doctor, it's about time for another anniversary~
Take a look at my gift: it's a bit of Lungmen Kung Pao Fowlbeast, among other things.
Do be sure to have some rice or noodles with the Kung Pao Fowlbeast. Wouldn't want the salt to overwhelm you.
I really have to thank you so much for everything you've done for me since I came to Rhodes Island. I've learned so much during my internship here.
I'm confident that, through all our efforts, Rhodes Island has an even brighter future ahead of her. And I'll do what I can to that end.
Now, let me give you a traditional Yanese blessing for the future, Doctor. Wish you good health!

mail_newyear_2022_3.title: Blessings from SilverAsh
mail_newyear_2022_3.content:
We're well beyond any sort of transactional relationship, my friend.
The anniversary draws near, so on behalf of Karlan Trade and the Silverash Clan——
I offer you this gift.
This beastmeat of the finest quality, once offered only as a sacrifice to Kjeragandr, is now yours to enjoy.
A heartfelt expression of my sincerity.
Now then, let us join in celebration together.

mail_newyear_2022_4.title: Blessings from Kal'tsit
mail_newyear_2022_4.content:
These celebrations do a lot to relieve the stress on our operators. But for you and I, Doctor, do you feel the weight of responsibility on your shoulders that much heavier as you watch them revel in their joy?
Even so, I suggest you join them. As a reward for your hard work.
I've allocated some supplies for you, and I hope you will indulge yourself, feel the camaraderie, and let yourself have fun.
This cube here is for you. It's edible, keeps for quite a long time, and is completely unadulterated. Just pop it into your mouth when you feel hungry.

mail_newyear_2022_5.title: Blessings from Amiya
mail_newyear_2022_5.content:
It's almost time for another anniversary,
Doctor. How do you feel? We've been through a lot this past year, so we have to let ourselves go and have a good time!
Here are some gifts I prepared for you. And I hope you'll be as cheerful every day as you are receiving them here today.
I need you walking this path with me for a long time to come!
Oh, and do let me know if you enjoy the cake.

mail_newyear_2024_1.title: Blessings from Muelsyse
mail_newyear_2024_1.content:
How come no one told me today was a special day? I could've had way more time to get you a good present...
I searched like crazy, and still had to settle for getting you all this li'l itsy-bitsy stuff.
You'd better have something good for me back~
Oh, and I've gotta say something to mark the occasion, right?
Then you just gimme a sec, Doctor, prommy?
I'll send a Flowing Shape your way now.

mail_newyear_2024_2.title: Blessings from Eyjafjalla the Hvít Aska
mail_newyear_2024_2.content:
Happy Anniversary, Professor.
Time flies so fast. I can't believe how long I've been with Rhodes Island now. I was so lucky to have met you, and so many other friends here.
Someone once told me 'The past isn't truly over. They're always by your side, in one way or another.' On a day like this, let's say goodbye to the past with an unburdened heart.
By the way, Blue Poison helped me make a dessert you'd like. I hope you really do enjoy it, and I wish you a sweet holiday.

mail_newyear_2024_3.title: Blessings from Viviana
mail_newyear_2024_3.content:
Hallo, Doctor, Happy Anniversary.
What a lively day this has been. I am most grateful to you and Rhodes Island for the hospitality. I'm having a wonderful time.
I've prepared some gifts for you, as a token of my appreciation. I do hop you will accept them with a smile.
May our future be a starlit one. And may you, my dear Doctor, enjoy good health and success in all your affairs.

mail_newyear_2024_4.title: Blessings from Zuo Le
mail_newyear_2024_4.content:
The passage of time welcomes new beginnings and great progress.
I offer a sincere wish for your joy, health, and peace in the coming year. Today holds extraordinary significance for every subject of Great Yan.On the mythological front, it symbolizes humanity's triumph over our great enemy, seizing the right to command our own destiny.
Man conquers Heaven, Man's work manifests.
Is that... perhaps a bit too grave?
Let me offer you some sweets I brought from Yumen, a favorite from my childhood. Many years have passed, yet the taste remains the same. I hope you'll enjoy them too.

mail_newyear_2024_5.title: Blessings from Amiya
mail_newyear_2024_5.content:
Happy Anniversary, Doctor!
I sent a gift for you. I wonder if you got it yet? I made you some little cookies this time, the kind that are easy to carry around. I hope you like them.
So if you get hungry, don't starve yourself, have a cookie to take the edge off. That's good for your body and your mood.
I only had time to make the cream-filled ones for now. If you want to try another flavor, maybe we could make them together in a dessert class?
After all, sweet memories come back easier than bitter ones.
It's getting late. Don't stay up too long.
See you... in the morning... Doctor~

mail_amiyaBirth_2025_1.title: A Thank-you Letter from Amiya
mail_amiyaBirth_2025_1.content:
Thank you so much, Doctor. I was really happy to receive so many blessings and gifts today.
You had already left when we were cutting the cake, probably caught up with work again, I guess? So I saved you a slice—make sure you eat it.
Next time, when your birthday comes, I'll prepare a cake for you in return. Don't say no—I know you're actually looking forward to it.
Hehe. Good night, Doctor.

mail_newyear_2025_1.title: Blessings from Wiš'adel
mail_newyear_2025_1.content:
You should still be at work right now. Don't ask how I know, I told you—I'm keeping an eye on you all.
The little bunny wants to follow in Her Highness's footsteps. Whether she can or not isn't my call, but she's doing quite well so far. So, you'd better be genuinely helping her out. Otherwise, you'll find out what I did to your desk.
Anyway, I'm not writing just to scare you—I'm not that bored.
I've prepared a gift for the little bunny; she's already got it. As for you, I made you a bowl of fried rice.
Feel free to toss it if you want, but this fried rice is cooked with the eternal flames from the furnace and my secret seasoning. It's probably the only bowl like it in all of Kazdel. Do whatever you think is best. Haha!
(The letter contains quite a few typos and some smudges, but on the whole, her writing has noticeably improved.)

mail_newyear_2025_2.title: Blessings from Pepe
mail_newyear_2025_2.content:
Greetings, Doctor!
I'm still at the excavation site and can't make it back to celebrate with you, so I've asked my maid to send over some lotus cakes.
These have been my favorite since childhood—I hope they suit your taste.
Of course, you don't have to eat them; they're quite nice to look at as well. Don't worry, they can last for quite a while!
I probably won't be back for another month, but the good news is there might be some big discoveries this time, so you can look forward to that!

mail_newyear_2025_3.title: Blessings from Lappland the Decadenza
mail_newyear_2025_3.content:
Out with the old! Haha, isn't this the favorite saying of us Nuova Volsinii pioneers with our ambitious spirit?
Doctor, you must be curious about what exactly Nuova Volsinii has left behind, right?
There's an address on the back of this letter. Go there and find Capone and Gambino; they'll lend you my car.
Take it for a spin around the city, and you'll see what you want to see.
Oh, and by the way, drunk driving is heavily penalized there—don't say I didn't warn you, haha!

mail_newyear_2025_4.title: Blessings from Yu
mail_newyear_2025_4.content:
Doctor, did you enjoy the dinner?
I had planned to rest after preparing the meal, but then I remembered your question from earlier today—whether having me around every year means you'll always get to enjoy my cooking?
Many people praise my cooking, but the way you put it is truly amusing. So, I made an extra snack just for you.
By the way, happy anniversary!

mail_newyear_2025_5.title: Blessings from Kal'tsit
mail_newyear_2025_5.content:
Doctor, the past year must have been quite significant for you.
You've delved into stories from the past, witnessed historical events, and bid farewell to some old friends. You've gained a deeper understanding of this land and yourself, and you should be more confident in the path you've chosen—the path of 'hope'.
Rhodes Island still faces countless challenges. No amount of preparation ever seems enough, but that doesn't mean we should give up our right to enjoy moments of leisure.
We seldom get the chance to experience pure joy, yet when we find ourselves in difficult times, it's often those cherished memories that help us overcome adversity.
Take the time to meet with the operators today; many are eager to see you on this special occasion. I believe they will remind you that on the challenging path you've chosen, you'll never walk alone.
The present we already have will also remind us that the true meaning of our efforts lies in the future.
Happy anniversary, Doctor.

mail_anniversary_2025_1.title: Report from Exusiai
mail_anniversary_2025_1.content:
Hey, Leader! The HR fieldwork procedures are tedious, so I'll give you a quick update directly!
Last month, I achieved an epic feat: playing 'Super Music Tycoon' with my left hand and the bottle shooting game with my right, beating both Emperor and Texas—just had to share!
Also, I used up all my leave at Penguin Logistics and plan to head home… By the way, if I'm not mistaken, you mentioned wanting to try the 'normal sweet' ice cream in Laterano?

mail_anniversary_2025_2.title: 6th Anniversary Livestream Rewards
mail_anniversary_2025_2.content:
Dear Doctor:
Thank you for your continued understanding and support of Arknights! The rewards for the 6th Anniversary Livestream have been delivered. Please claim them from this mail.

mail_cdk_story_1.title: Message from Kal'tsit
mail_cdk_story_1.content:
Doctor, I want to entrust you with everything I've gathered and compiled from the past. Perhaps, this signifies the long-awaited revelation of my purpose. But don't concern yourself too much. For you, this is simply a routine transfer.
It should endure independently of me, and you should know how to unlock its secrets.
